post.summary: Add an item to your shopping cart.
post.description: Add an item to your shopping cart. This endpoint is used for adding products or services to your cart.

requestBody.description: Request payload. Fields booking_item and email_verification are required. You must also specify at least one of api_client.id or api_client.email.

booking_item.description: Booking item UUID from pricing search response

booking_id.description: Optional booking_id if adding item to an existing booking

email_verification.description: Email where verification link will be sent

api_client.description: API client identification (must specify at least id or email)

withBookingId.summary: Booking item with existing booking_id and client email

post.description: Add passengers to a booking. This endpoint is used to add passenger information to a booking.

parameters.name: booking_id
parameters.description:
To retrieve the **booking_id**, you need to execute a **'/api/booking/add-item'** request.
* In the response object for each rate is a **booking_id** property.

requestBody.description: JSON object containing the details of the reservation. If you don't pass booking_item(s), these passengers will be added to all booking_items that are in the cart (booking_id)

get.summary: Retrieve available changes for modifying an existing booking.
get.description: This endpoint provides information about available changes for modifying an existing booking.

200.description: Successful response with available endpoints for modifying the booking.

description.example: Endpoint to handle soft changes in booking.

post.summary: Retrieve available changes for modifying an existing booking.
post.description: This endpoint provides information about available changes for modifying an existing booking.

requestBody.description: JSON object containing the details of the reservation.

post.summary: Create a new booking for a service or event
post.description: Create a new booking for a service or event. Use this endpoint to make reservations.

requestBody.description: Request payload. At least one of api_client.id or api_client.email is required.

api_client.description: Optional identification of API client (id or email or both)

Example Booking Book with ID.summary: Example Booking Book Request with Client ID

Example Booking Book Request special_req.summary: Example Booking Book Request with special_requests and comments

errors.message: The booking_contact.phone field must be a valid phone number.
The booking_contact.phone.country_code field must be one of the allowed country codes (e.g., 1 for USA, 44 for UK). Valid values are integers between 1 and 999.
The booking_contact.phone.area_code field must be exactly 3 digits (e.g., 212 for New York).
The booking_contact.phone.number field must be between 3 and 10 digits (e.g., 1234567).

delete.summary: Cancel an existing booking reservation. Submit a request to cancel a reservation you no longer require.

parameters.name: booking_item
parameters.description:
To retrieve the **booking_item**, you need to execute a **'/api/pricing/search'** request.
     *      In the response object for each rate is a **booking_item** property.
     *      If there is no booking_item, all items will be deleted

put.description: Hard modify an existing booking. This endpoint allows for significant changes to the booking, such as replacing the booking item.

requestBody.description: JSON object containing the details of the modification.

booking_item.description: UUID of the existing booking item to be modified.

new_booking_item.description: UUID of the new booking item to replace the existing one.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the passenger.

room.description: Room number or identifier for the passenger.

put.description: Modify an existing booking. You can update booking details, change dates, or make other adjustments to your reservation.

requestBody.description: JSON object containing the details of the reservation.

room.description: Room number for the special request

post.summary: Retrieve a specific booking quote by booking_item.
post.description: This endpoint provides information about actual availability and pricing for a specific booking quote (unbooked cart item) for the agent.

200.description: Successful response with available endpoints for modifying the booking.

current_search.rate_description: With a separate bedroom and living area in approximately 540 square feet, you?ll enjoy privacy as well as space to socialize and relax. Park Central?s Premier suites feature a king-size bed, pull-out sofa, two HD TVs, and our notable mahogany-finish furnishings. These suites are located on higher floors and offer impressive city views. Max. 4 guests (extra-person charges apply).

stay.title: Destination Fee
stay.description:
The Park Central Hotel New York mandatory Destination Fee priced at $40.00 plus tax per room, per night which provides guests with the following services, amenities and added value offerings:


* Complimentary Wi-Fi

* Unlimited Local and Domestic Long Distance calls

* iMac Apple workstations with printing, faxing and scanning offered through our Guest Relations Team

* Free Luggage Storage

* 10% discount at in-house food and beverage outlets

* 20% discount at Serafina Restaurant, 10% at Red Eye Grill,  10% Mulberry & Grand, 10% Fuji sushi, 15% Cucina 8 1/2

* 1 hour complimentary bike rental for 2 at Fancy Apple Bike Rental with a purchase of one hour



The facilities fee is not inclusive of service gratuities.

Restaurant opening times and menus might change, due to government regulations.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all your booking reservations.
get.description: Retrieve a list of all your booking reservations. This endpoint provides an overview of your booking history and their current statuses.

parameters.name: api_client_id
parameters.description: API client user ID. Either api_client_id or api_client_email must be provided.

parameters.name: api_client_email
parameters.description: API client email. Either api_client_id or api_client_email must be provided.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If set to true, ignores filtering by API user and token.

parameters.name: booking_date_to
parameters.description: Filter bookings up to this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: checkin_date_from
parameters.description: Filter bookings with check-in from this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: checkin_date_to
parameters.description: Filter bookings with check-in up to this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: List booking quotes (unbooked cart items) for the agent.
get.description: Returns a list of booking_ids (booking_items) that are not yet booked for the agent but are in the cart.

parameters.name: api_client_id
parameters.description: API client user ID. Either api_client_id or api_client_email must be provided.

parameters.name: api_client_email
parameters.description: API client email. Either api_client_id or api_client_email must be provided.

parameters.name: booking_date_from
parameters.description: Filter quotes created from this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: booking_date_to
parameters.description: Filter quotes created up to this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

get.summary: Search for hotels, points of interest, attractions, airports, cities and countries by name
get.description: Search is performed by hotel names, points of interest, attractions, airport names, city names, and country names. The 'hotel' parameter is required and must contain at least 3 characters. Pagination is supported via 'page' and 'per_page' parameters. The response returns an array of giata_ids, which can be used in the endpoints POST /api/v1/content/search and POST /api/pricing/search.

parameters.name: hotel
parameters.description: Search string for hotel names, points of interest, attractions, airports, city names, and country names. Minimum 3 characters.

Expedia.hotel_name: EVEN Hotel New York - Times Square South

hotel_fees.optional:
• Fee for cooked-to-order breakfast: approximately USD 1220 per person
  • Nearby parking fee: USD 60 per day (98 ft away)
  • Pet fee: USD 75 per pet, per stay
  • Service animals are exempt from fees
  • Facilities fee: USD 25 per accommodation, per night

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
hotel_fees.mandatory:
You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property:

  • Resort fee: USD 25 per accommodation, per night
The resort fee includes:
  • Additional inclusions
  • Phone calls

We have included all charges provided to us by the property.

policies.know_before_you_go:
• The property has connecting/adjoining rooms, which are subject to availability and can be requested by contacting the property using the number on the booking confirmation.
  • This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place.
  • The property is cleaned and disinfected using an electrostatic sprayer; disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60C/140F; guestroom doors are sealed after cleaning.
  • Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests.
  • Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer; cashless payment methods are available for all transactions; contactless room service is available; masks are required in public areas; reservations are required for some onsite facilities.
    • \n
  • Contactless check-out is available.
  • Enhanced food service safety measures are in place.
  • Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
  • Each guestroom is kept vacant for a minimum of 72 hours between bookings.
  • This property affirms that it follows the cleaning and disinfection practices of Clean Promise (IHG).
  • This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of SafeStay (AHLA - USA).
    • \n
  • This property welcomes guests of all sexual orientations and gender identities (LGBTQ+ friendly).

descriptions.rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 150 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Your pillowtop bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.
descriptions.dining: You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of EVEN Hotel New York - Times Square South, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.
descriptions.headline: Near Madison Square Garden
descriptions.location: EVEN Hotel New York - Times Square South is centrally located in New York, a 4-minute walk from Madison Square Garden and 10 minutes by foot from Times Square.  This 4-star hotel is 0.8 mi (1.3 km) from The High Line Park and 1 mi (1.6 km) from Broadway.
descriptions.amenities: Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a 24-hour fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.
descriptions.attractions:
Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Madison Square Garden - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Macy's - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
New York Times Building - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Herald Square - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Madame Tussauds Wax Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Times Square - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Broadway - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
The High Line Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
5th Avenue - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Jacob K. Javits Convention Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Empire State Building - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Bryant Park - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Chelsea Hotel - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Madison Square Park - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Broadway Theatre - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (NYS-Skyports Seaplane Base) - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
LaGuardia Airport (LGA) - 16.7 km / 10.3 mi
Teterboro, NJ (TEB) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
Newark Liberty Intl. Airport (EWR) - 26 km / 16.2 mi
John F. Kennedy Intl. Airport (JFK) - 27.9 km / 17.3 mi

The preferred airport for EVEN Hotel New York - Times Square South is John F. Kennedy Intl. Airport (JFK).
descriptions.business_amenities: Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.

260 sq feet

ContentDetailV1Response.description: An example response for the Content Detail API.

checkin.instructions:
• Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation
  • This property accepts credit cards and cash
checkin.special_instructions: The front desk is open daily from 8:00 AM - 8:00 PM. The front desk is staffed during limited hours.

policies.know_before_you_go:
• Children may not be eligible for complimentary breakfast.
  • No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property.
  • Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available.

Note.value: Screenshot for price match if needed.

Cancellation Policy.value:
Resort Policy Updates (excludes Private Villa Collection)
72 hour cancellation policy from Jan 3, 2021 to Mar 31, 2021
 7 day cancellation policy from April 1 through June 30, 2021
 14 days cancellation policy from Jul 1  Dec 22, 2021
 Festive Dec 23-Jan 2: 50% deposit on booking, Sep 1 full deposit required, non-refundable as of Sep 1
 30 days cancellation policy from Jan 2  Feb 15 , 2022
 60 days cancellation policy from Feb 16  Apr 16, 2022
 30 days cancellation policy from Apr 17  Dec 21, 2022
 Festive Dec 22 -Jan 1: 50% deposit on booking, Sep 1 full deposit required, non-refundable as of Sep 1

Private Villa Collections Cancellation Policy Updates
 50% deposit on booking, 14 day cancellation policy from Jan 3 to Jun 30, 2021 (14 day cxl extended thru Q2)
 50% deposit on booking, 60 day cancellation policy from July 1 to December 22, 2021
 Festive Dec 23-Jan 2: 50% deposit on booking, Sep 1 full deposit required, non-refundable as of Sep 1
 50% deposit on booking, 60 day cancellation policy from Jan 2 to December 21, 2022
 Festive Dec 22 -Jan 1: 50% deposit on booking, Sep 1 full deposit required, non-refundable as of Sep 1

Payment Terms.value: Credit Except for Festive. Full payment due by September 1.

descriptions.rooms: Make yourself at home in one of the 25 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
descriptions.dining: Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to noon.
descriptions.headline: Near Grace Bay Beach
descriptions.location: When you stay at The All New Grace Bay Suites in Providenciales, you'll be near the beach, a 1-minute drive from Grace Bay Beach and 7 minutes from Long Bay Beach.  This hotel is 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Lucayan Archipelago and 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from The Regent Village Shopping Mall.
descriptions.amenities: Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area.
descriptions.attractions:
Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lucayan Archipelago - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
The Regent Village Shopping Mall - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Providenciales Beaches - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Salt Mills Plaza - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Princess Alexandra National Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Grace Bay Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Coral Gardens Reef - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Long Bay Beach - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Leeward Beach - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
The Hole - 4.3 km / 2.6 mi
Royal Flush Gaming Parlor - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Pelican Beach - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Provo Conch Farm - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Turtle Cove Marina - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Turtle Lake - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi

The nearest major airport is Providenciales Intl. Airport (PLS) - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
descriptions.business_amenities: The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite.

deposit_information.name: Festive Dec 23-Jan 2: 50% deposit on booking
deposit_information.conditions: booking_date < 2021-09-01, travel_date between 2021-12-23 2022-01-02, room_type!= Private Villa

deposit_information.name: Festive Dec 23-Jan 2: Sep 1 full deposit required,
deposit_information.conditions: booking_date > 2021-09-01, room_type!= Private Villa, travel_date between 2021-12-23 2022-01-02

cancellation_policies.name: 72 hour cancellation policy from Jan 3, 2021 to Mar 31, 2021
cancellation_policies.conditions: travel_date between 2021-01-03 2021-03-31, room_type!= Private Villa, days_until_departure < 3

cancellation_policies.name: 7 day cancellation policy from April 1 through June 30, 2021
cancellation_policies.conditions: travel_date between 2021-04-01 2021-06-30, room_type!= Private Villa, days_until_departure < 7

rooms.supplier_room_name: Classic Room, 1 King Bed, Balcony, Pool View
rooms.descriptions:
1 King Bed

420-sq-foot soundproofed room, balcony/patio with pool views


Internet - Free WiFi

Food & Drink - Coffee/tea maker and room service (limited hours)

Sleep - Blackout drapes/curtains and bed sheets

Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower, a hair dryer, and towels

Practical - Safe, iron/ironing board, and desk; rollaway/extra beds and cribs/infant beds available on request

Comfort - Air conditioning and daily housekeeping

Non-Smoking

tags.name: Auth API | Channel Clients
tags.description: Issue channel tokens for API clients. Authenticates user by email/password, requires 'api-user' role and an active bound channel, returns channel token for subsequent requests.
